title: Elon Musk mocks Apple over return to office delay; Twitter staff express concern
content:

description: A tweet by Elon Musk mocks Apple over the company’s announcement of a further delay to the next phase of its return-to-office plans … Background Most Apple corporate employees were originally set to return to the office in September of last year, after more than a year of remote working due to the pandemic.
